game_modes.name: Extended
game_modes.description:
Explore all the starfighter battles X-Wing has to offer!

The Extended game mode encompasses every component for X-Wing Second Edition, including the ships only found in the Conversion Kits. Choose a faction, then select up to 200 points of pilots and upgrades to create your squad.

game_modes.name: Hyperspace
game_modes.description:
The Second Edition game mode is an ideal introduction for players new to X-Wing.

This game mode includes only those components found in the second edition Core Set and ship expansions. Choose a faction, then select up to 200 points of pilots and upgrades to create your squad.

game_modes.name: Epic
game_modes.description: Expand the scope of your X-Wing games! The epic mode broadens the possibilities with entire wings of starfighters working as one while fighting alongside-and against-huge ships like the iconic CR90 Corvette.

game_modes.name: Variants
game_modes.description: Enjoy new ways to play in the Star Wars galaxy with a series of tailored and unique experiences. Each one introduces a specific pool of pilots and upgrades to build your squad from.

game_modes.name: Custom
game_modes.description:
Create new and unique ways to play X-Wing Second Edition with your friends!

The Custom game mode allows the creation of your own variants. You can adjust the pool of factions, ships, pilots, and upgrades. You can also include special instructions for setup and objectives.
